title: We're Having Fun in URF - PLEASE DON'T TAKE IT DOWN

embed.description: URF is fun. Don't take it down Blizzard.. Leave a like if you don't want blizzard to take down URF! Facebook page â–º https://www.facebook.com/XSirCution Thanks for subscribing guys!

body: Rito ples, don't take down da URF

replies.body: Draft = ranked and aram is very different to an "amped up" version of summoner's rift.
If they kept U.R.F the game mode would eventually get boring. its better to put it up once a year than 4 ever
and yet we all still play draft mode and aram
sigh true urf is very fun espeacially cos i can spam {{champion:432}} ult and TROLL LIKE FUCK
Yeh they're going to take it away. Deal with it.
